00022 #define   expf(x)  fexp(x)

00025 float     flog(float x);
00026 #define   powf(x,y)    ((float) pow((double)(x), (double)(y)))
00027 #define   fabsf(x)    ((float)(fabs((double)(x))))
00028 #define   ceilf(x)  fceil(x)
00029 #define   nintf (int)
00030 #else
00031 #define   fexp(x)     ((float)(exp((double)(x))))
00032 #define   expf(x)     ((float)(exp((double)(x))))
00033 #define   fabsf(x)    ((float)(fabs((double)(x))))
00034 #define   fsqrt(x)    ((float)(sqrt((double)(x))))
00035 #define   sqrtf(x)    ((float)(sqrt((double)(x))))
00036 #define   flog10(x)   ((float)(log10((double)(x))))
00037 #define   log10f(x)   ((float)(log10((double)(x))))
00038 #define   flog(x)     ((float)(log((double)(x))))
00039 #define   logf(x)     ((float)(log((double)(x))))
00040 #define   floorf(x)   ((float) floor((double)(x)))
00041 #define   ceilf(x)    ((float) ceil((double)(x)))
00042 #define   powf(x,y)    ((float) pow((double)(x), (double)(y)))
00043 #define   nintf (int)
